Content.Text: Spring Issue #1
Spring Issue #2
Spring Issue #3
Spring Issue #4
Summer Issue #1

Summer Issue #4

Winter Issue #2
Winter Issue #3
Winter Issue #4

The warm winds of Spring have been
relaxing. It may be a great idea to
stroll around the mountains today.

Have you already seen the beautiful
cherry blossoms this season?

Already set plans for Spring?
Let's explore the wilds by checking the
woods or river!

Spring is the season for rice planting.
If you forgot to, then you should start
right now.

Happy New Years!
Let's set goals for the year and have a
great year without any regrets!

Spring has arrived for the wilds.
How about hunting for wild vegetables
in the Mountain Area?

It's Spring, yet it still feels a
bit chilly.
Let's eat well and stay healthy!

It's diffidently spring now! I see a lot
of butterflies and bees out. Let's go
catch critters in the Forest Area.

Hello, how are you doing in this heat?
I can't write well in the heat...
Let's fest up the summer!

☆Summer Greetings!☆
Let's try to watch over ourselves by
avoiding heatstroke!

Are you ready for the Summer?
Let's enjoy the outdoors by exploring
many places such as the river or forest!

It has been scorching outside, so be
careful of summer weariness. Drink water
and eat well to stay healthy!

Are you prepared for the season where
the weather gets rough? Make sure to
take care of your crops and animals!

This year's summer is exceptionally hot.
Drink water and eat well to stay
healthy!

Summer is about fishing! Let's all go
fishing in the Mountain and River Areas!
Just who will be the fishing champion??

The rain continues again today.
Stay healthy and don't be
defeated by the rain and win!

How is everyone doing now that the heat
has eased off to welcome a new season?

The summer heat is completely gone and
has become cooler. We can now relax like
the dancing leaves.

Already set plans for autumn?
Let's explore the wilds by checking the
woods or river!

Refreshing winds have blown allowing us
to relax. How is everyone doing in this
season of falling leaves?

It's now the season where the song of
critters sooth the soul. How about a
trip to the river or forest areas?

It's the season for sports now! How
about a trip to the beautiful mountains?
Don't forget about your farm though.

It's the season for literature now.
How about reading some books for fun?

It's the season for an appetite! Time
to harvest Sweet Potatoes, Pike,
Chestnuts...Just don't eat too much.

It's now the cold  season where the snow
falls. I always get an appetite for
Crab Soup...is it too much to ask?

Already set plans for winter?
Let's explore the wilds by checking the
woods or river!

It is now cold enough to see our own breath
breath. It's best to eat warm food during
this season!

It's easy to catch colds in the winter
due to the cold climate. Be careful.

This year is about to come to an end.
Try to spend it without any regrets.

It's the season of snow storms.
Are you prepared for it? Make sure to
look after your crops and animals!

Lately, I've been freezing to the bone.
Try not to catch a cold by wearing warm
clothes when going outside.

Fishing Upstream at the River Area

The location to catch medium sized fish
such as Sweet fish and Char.
Fish are easy to catch here and is
popular as a beginners' location.

Fishing Downstream at the River Area

The location to catch large fish such as
Sea Bass.
An enjoyable location for finding fish
only local to this area.

Fishing Upstream at the Mountain Area

The location known for catching giant
fish. This area is also famous for
it crystal-clear water.

Waterfall Fishing at the Mountain Area

A great fishing location with a basin
near the waterfall. A great place to go
after medium and large fish. Don't let
your fishing pole get taken away!

Fishing at the Farm Area

Not much information about this newly
developed location. There's no knowing
what you can catch here... Rumors say
that you need a Master Rod to catch any
fish here.

Fishing at Southern Island

A location filled with large fish and
requires a Master Rod to catch any. Of
course, Seafood such as <GREEN>Sardine</GREEN> or
<GREEN>Pike</GREEN>.

Fishing at the Land of the East

Rare to find a location that is as
compact as this one.
It is a great mystery as to how the
fish got here.

Ice Fishing at Snowland

It's about catching the <RED>Smelt</RED> here!
Don't forget to bring an <GREEN>Ice Drill</GREEN> if
you plan to fish here. Rumors say
that there are fish that can survive
the extreme cold in this location.

Trap Fishing at the River Area

Small Sweet fish and Small Shishamo
work well for Fish Traps.
You can't catch large fish, but
there are fish that can only be
captured with traps.

Trap Fishing at Southern Island

There are oceanic fish that can be
trapped here. There are rare fish here,
so set traps multiple times!
There's a creature with black spikes and
8 legs...what was it's name again?

Critters Found in Spring

In this beautiful season full of
flowers, there are a lot of bees and
butterflies. Explore to find them!

Critters Found in Summer

Along with the seasonal critter Cicada,
you can find the critter all boys must
go after: the Rhinoceros Beetle!
You can see the luminous light of
fireflies at night.

Critters Found in Fall

Dragonflies avoid the heat and gather at
the waterbed. Dragonflies can be found
until the beginning of Winter.

Critters Found in Winter

Most critters hibernate in the winter,
but Locust can be found energetically
hopping on the ground.

Natural Blessings of Spring

Many types of herbs and wildflowers grow
in the spring. Bamboo can be found too,
but no one knows where it comes from.

Natural Blessings of Summer

In this moist season, mushrooms can
be found at the base of the mountain.
It's the season for rare ingredients.

Natural Blessings of Fall

Chestnuts fall often from being shaken
by the Autumn breeze. Mushrooms can also
be found by digging through leaves.

Natural Blessings of Winter

In the season where critters and animals
hibernate, we can find snowballs and
herbs shining like water under the snow.

Bouncy Mushrooms

In the forests or mountains, you can use
Mushrooms to jump high! All you have to
do is to <RED>jump onto the Mushroom</RED>!

Warp Stumps

In the forests or mountains, you can use
stumps to move to different places. All
you have to do is jump into the stump!

Musical Stumps

Past the river is a tree that makes
sounds if you hammer it. You can play a
song if you have a <GREEN>Music Score</GREEN>.

The Elder Tree

Imagine what the Elder tree, the oldest
of the woods has gone through until
now. Use <GREEN>Hammer</GREEN> to get items from it.

Catch More Critters with Honey

You can use honey on trees that have
some bark peeled off to lure critters
onto the tree.

The Frozen Sea of Snowland

Have you taken a vacation to Snowland?
You can open holes in the frozen sea
with an <GREEN>ice drill</GREEN> to
enjoy some fishing.

Mining in the Mines

There are three places to excavate in
the mines, but you need <RED>an upgraded
hammer</RED> in order to mine one of
them.

Tips for Building a Town

The power of nature is very strong in
this area, so trees grow even in towns
or farms. Use an <GREEN>axe</GREEN> to cut trees down.

Tips for Building a Town

Placing <GREEN>streets</GREEN> is important to connect
houses. You can tell where to walk with
a street and allows outsiders to
sightsee easier.

Tips for Building a Town

<MYFARM> Farm is the only farm in town.
If your farm is full of animals or
crops, I'm sure people will want to
visit it.

Tips for Building a Town

You can place objects under things like
<GREEN>arches</GREEN>. Try to build
arches over the road to place items!

Tips for Building a Town

The <GREEN>plaza</GREEN> has a place to put objects.
Town-building becomes more fun when you
place objects in certain areas.

Tips for Building a Town

Places to rest are a necessity for
town-building. Try to place furniture
such as <GREEN>benches</GREEN> or <GREEN>garden chairs</GREEN>
to allow easier living in your town.

Announcement of Mines Opening

Big news, everyone!!!
The <RED>mines in the forest area have
opened!</RED> <MYNAME> has removed the
boulder that was blocking the entrance
to the mines.

Congratulations on Town Rejuvenation!

Thank you, <MYNAME>! You have
rejuvenated our town and made it better
than it could ever be! This town is
<RED>a town I can be proud of</RED>!

Congratulations on Getting Married!

The owners of <MOJI0> Farm, <MYNAME>
and <CHARANAME0>, have gotten married!
May you two live happily ever after!

Congratulations on Your Newborn Baby!

The owners of <MOJI0> Farm, <MYNAME>
and <CHARANAME0>, have a new baby!
May your new family member bring
you years of joy!

Legendary Tuna Found?!

A large tuna was found <RED>midstream in
the river area</RED>!
Rumor is that the fish that can be
lured in with the melody of trees.

Big Yellow Fish

A big fish with a faint yellow color
was found <RED>downstream in the
river area</RED>. It seems to be a fish
that appears in warm areas.

String-Like Fish

Also known as the Ito, this fish is part
of the salmon family. It was recently
found <RED>downstream in the
mountain area</RED>. Don't underestimate it
because it's skinny!

New Fish Found at Waterfall?!

A giant fish was found next at the
fishing location next to the waterfall!
It's so big you will drop your jaw when
you see it! Anyone who can catch this
fish can boast about it.

Fish with Mustache

A rare fish with a mustache was found
in the Farm Area. Studies show that it
can detect earthquakes with its
mustache... No way!

A Pair of Fish Appear!

A pair for giant fish were found at the
<RED>Southern Island</RED>, an area famous for
sea fishing. One of the fish is flat,
and the other resembles a spear.

The Beauty in the Lake

A large shadow was spotted in the Lake
of the Land of the East. Locals claim:
"We don't know where it came from."

King of the Arctic Seas

There are fish that can stand the 
subzero of <RED>Snowland</RED>! Two of them, at
that! One is an odd fish with a lantern
on its head, and the other is said to 
have existed since ancient times.

Not a Turtle?

A fisher used a fish trap <RED>downstream at
the river area</RED> to catch a big one.
Unlike turtles, it seems to have a
soft shell.

Blue-Green Crab

A crab that is blue and green with
scissors unlike any other was found
<RED>midstream at the river area</RED>.

Long and Slender Creature

A new species has come from the ocean!
The person who discovered it let it
slip from their hands because of its
slippery body. This mystery fish can
be found <RED>downstream at the river area</RED>.

Giant Crab?!

Somebody succeeded in capturing it at
a fish trap location on a beach! It is a
large crab that has three sturdy-looking
legs... Is it really a crab?!

Ladybugs of the Forest

Ladybugs only appear in winter or
fall. Also, the <GREEN>Orange Ladybug</GREEN>
only appears in the <RED>forest area</RED>.

Cornered Cricket

There is a rare critter that can only
be found in the <RED>forest area</RED>. The
outline of this critter is very pointy,
hence the name <GREEN>Cornered Cricket</GREEN>.

Butterflies of the East

Known for its magnificent purple, the
<GREEN>Purple Emperor</GREEN> is treasured and popular
in the Land of the East. It's said
that you can find this butterfly in the
<RED>river area</RED> of this region.

The Giant Dragonfly

The <GREEN>Golden Dragonfly</GREEN> is the largest
dragonfly and found in a certain country.
Rumored to be in the <RED>river area</RED>.

The Color-Changing Butterfly

Butterflies can be seen everywhere, but
the <GREEN>Velvet Brush-Foot</GREEN> can only be seen
in the <RED>mountain area</RED>. This mysterious
critter is said to change color
depending on the illumination.

Rare Frog in the Mountains

The <GREEN>Mountain Brown Frog</GREEN> can only be seen
in the <RED>mountain area</RED> on rainy days. 
They tend to have different colors...

Rare Locust in the Mountains

The <GREEN>Brown Cricket</GREEN> eats grass often. It
lives in the <RED>mountain area</RED>... I wonder
if the grass is tasty there.

Dancing Blue Butterfly

There are many different species of
critters in the <RED>forest area</RED>. The most
beautiful amongst them is the <GREEN>Miyama
Swallowtail</GREEN>. How about setting foot in
the forest for a glimpse?

Mysterious Firefly

There are many types of Fireflies, but
not much is known about the <GREEN>Purple
Firefly</GREEN>. It has recently been found
near the water at night.

Recommended Vacation Plans

If you want to see cherry blossoms or
stone sculptures, then "<GREEN>Adventuring
Through the Cherry Blossoms</GREEN>" is your
answer! Collect a ton of material here!

Recommended Vacation Plans

For those who want to sea the ocean,
then "<GREEN>Traveling to the Tropical South</GREEN>"
is your answer! You can play at the 
beach or capture unique fish here!

Recommended Vacation Plans

If you want snowballs galore, then
"<GREEN>Snowland Tour of the Far North</GREEN>" is the
answer! Here's all the snow you need!

Recommended Vacation Plans

If you want to experience a mystical
tour, then "<GREEN>The Romance of Ancient
Exploration</GREEN>" is the best. You can personally
enjoy ancient structures.

Editing to the Max

I heard that you can make the bees in
the beehive more active by <RED>lining the
bees up closer together</RED>.

Editing to the Max

I heard that you can make the
mushrooms breed faster on the
mushroom log if you <RED>line them up
closer together</RED>.

Editing to the Max

I heard that if you <RED>place an anchor
and a bridge near the fishing shed</RED>,
the fish will eat well and grow
better.

Editing to the Max

I heard that if you put cow-related
objects together, the cows will be
happier. Try placing a <GREEN>Cow Statue</GREEN>,
a <GREEN>Horse Statue</GREEN>, and <GREEN>Milk Cans</GREEN>.
Why the Horse Statue? Details don't matter.

Editing to the Max

I heard that if you put sheep-related
objects together, the sheep will be
happier. Try placing a <GREEN>Sheep Statue</GREEN>,
a <GREEN>Horse Statue</GREEN>, and a <GREEN>Hay Bale</GREEN>.
Why the Horse Statue? Details don't matter.

Editing to the Max

I heard that if you put chicken-related
objects together, the chickens will be
happier. Try placing a <GREEN>Chicken Statue</GREEN>,
a <GREEN>Horse Statue</GREEN>, and a <GREEN>Weather Vane</GREEN>.
Why the Horse Statue? Details don't matter.

Editing to the Max

Surrounding a object with a fence will
produce different effects. Surrounding
a tree will make it <GREEN>resistant to storms
or blizzards</GREEN>. Try different colors for
different effects!

Editing to the Max

I heard that in another town, <BLUE>brick objects</BLUE>
and <BLUE>flowered arches</BLUE> placed around
their gardening space<RED> improved
feedback of their garden tours</RED>.

Editing to the Max

I heard that if you gather all of
the Makers in one spot, their true
potential will be unleashed!

Editing to the Max

When a town is built to resemble the
tropics, <RED>trips to the south cost less</RED>.
What you need is a <GREEN>Palm Tree</GREEN>, a <GREEN>Beach
Chair</GREEN>, a <GREEN>Parasol</GREEN>, and a <GREEN>Hammock</GREEN>!

Editing to the Max

When a town is built to be warmer,
<RED>trips to the north cost less</RED>. What you
need is a <GREEN>Paper Lantern</GREEN>, a <GREEN>Stone Lantern</GREEN>,
a <GREEN>Beacon</GREEN>, and a <GREEN>Statue of the Sun</GREEN>!

Editing to the Max

When a town is built to resemble the East,
<RED>trips to the Land of the East cost less</RED>.
What you need are a <GREEN>Bamboo Fence</GREEN>, a
<GREEN>Stone Lantern</GREEN>, a <GREEN>Cherry Tree</GREEN>,
a <GREEN>Pine Decoration</GREEN>, and a <GREEN>Bamboo Fountain</GREEN>!

Editing to the Max

When a town is built to resemble the
ancient ruins, <RED>trips to the Ancient
Ruins cost less</RED>. What you need are a
<GREEN>Stone Wall</GREEN>, a <GREEN>Large Totem Pole</GREEN>, a <GREEN>Beacon</GREEN>,
and a <GREEN>Statue of the Sun</GREEN>!

Editing to the Max

If you plant a <GREEN>Pine Tree</GREEN>, <GREEN>Cherry Tree</GREEN>,
and a </GREEN>Ginko Tree</GREEN>, then the two Ancient
trees of the Forest Area become
happier. I'm sure they'll drop more
items then!

How to Improve Your Farm

We had an interview with one of the members
of the Farm Revitalization Committee today!
"The first step to farming is to have
more crops, animals, and objects."

How to Improve Your Farm

We had an interview with one of the members
of the Farm Revitalization Committee today!
"Having a variety of crops is always better.
Never let your crops wither!"

How to Improve Your Farm

We had an interview with one of the members
of the Farm Revitalization Committee today!
"Having a variety of animals is always
better. Take good care of your animals
by brushing them and cleaning the barn."

How to Improve Your Farm

We had an interview with one of the members
of the Farm Revitalization Committee today!
"Having a lot of objects is not always good.
Try arranging flowers or rare objects...
Utilize what you have!"

Obtaining Rare Items!

When I was fishing at the river and
exploring the woods, I found blueprints
and recipes! I wonder if someone
dropped them... Maybe you'll find
something if you explore, too!

To the Blacksmith for Tools

You can upgrade your tools, but maybe
you need to befriend Iroha first...

Taxi of the Sea

Legend says that a when you go south
during summer, you meet a person with
a turtle shell on their back. Then that
person will guide you to an offshore
island! Is it true...?!

Ambitions Sunk at the Very Bottom

Long ago, there was a pirate who
obtained many treasures through many
journeys. However, he was betrayed by
one of his crew... Legend says he silently
rests under the cold ice of Snowland.

Mountain Area Lake

Harvest sprites, assistants to the
Harvest Goddess, live in this area. Come
to think of it, I do see them come down
from the mountains, so would that mean
the Harvest Goddess lives at the lake?
